casebody.data:
Second Department,

December, 1954.

(December 6, 1954.) Sylvia Ehrlich et al., Individually and as Trustees for Martin Ehrlich and Others, Appellants, v. German Savings Bank and Clearing Association, Respondent, et al., Defendant.

Motion for leave to appeal to the Court of Appeals denied. Present — Adel, Acting P. J., Wenzel, MaeCrate, Beldock and Murphy, JJ. [See ante, p. 964.]
